weekly picks (Nov 1 week 2022)

Posted on October 31, 2022 in 2022nov,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2022 Nov 1st week collection

  1. PhysRevLett.129.193601 Long-Lived Memory for Orbital Angular Momentum Quantum States (OAM qubit, PRL)

  2. PhysRevB.106.L201101 Integer quantum Hall effect and enhanced $g$ factor in quantum-confined ${\mathrm{Cd}}{3}{\mathrm{As}}{2}$ films (Cd3As2, PRB)

  3. PhysRevB.106.174501 Disorder suppression in topological semiconductor-superconductor junctions (PRB)

  4. PhysRevB.106.174502 Anomalous supercurrent modulated by interfacial magnetizations in Josephson junctions with ferromagnetic bilayers (PRB)

  5. PhysRevB.106.184101 Design of a higher-order nodal-line semimetal in a spring-shaped acoustic topological crystal (PRB)

  6. PhysRevB.106.184401 Multicritical phase diagram of ${\mathrm{PrMn}}{1\ensuremath{-}x}{\mathrm{Sb}}{2}$ with two interacting magnetic elements (PRB)

  7. PhysRevB.106.184501 Stochastic path-integral approach for predicting the superconducting temperatures of anharmonic solids (anharmonicity, PRB)

  8. PhysRevB.106.205102 Unconventional optical selection rules in ${\mathrm{ZrTe}}_{5}$ under an in-plane magnetic field (PRB)

  9. PhysRevB.106.205103 Correlated electronic structure of the kagome metal ${\mathrm{Mn}}_{3}\mathrm{Sn}$ (kagome, PRB)

  10. PhysRevB.106.L180401 Origin of ferromagnetic interactions in ${\mathrm{NaMnCl}}_{3}$: How the response theory reconciles with Goodenough-Kanamori-Anderson rules (PRB)

  11. PhysRevB.106.L180402 Magnetic structure and spin fluctuations in the colossal magnetoresistance ferrimagnet ${\mathrm{Mn}}{3}{\mathrm{Si}}{2}{\mathrm{Te}}_{6}$ (PRB)

  12. 2210.16493 Neural network quantum state with proximal optimization: a ground-state searching scheme based on variational Monte Carlo (ML VMC, arXiv)

  13. 2210.16614 Topological symplectic Kondo effect (Kondo, arXiv)

  14. 2210.17099 Nonlinear spin current of photoexcited magnons in collinear antiferromagnets (Morimoto, arXiv)

  15. 2210.17198 Disorder effects in the Kitaev-Heisenberg model (arXiv)

  16. 2210.17455 Refined magnetic structure of VI$_3$ (VI3,arXiv)

  17. 2210.16321 Resonating valence bond states and other surprises in an electron-phonon system (SKivelson, arXiv.org)

  18. 2210.16324 Triplet Pair-Density Wave Superconductivity on the $\pi$-flux Square Lattice (arXiv.org)

  19. 2210.16890 Linear nonsaturating magnetoresistance in kagome superconductor CsV3Sb5 thin flakes (kagome, arXiv.org)

  20. 2210.16958 Topological Josephson junction in transverse magnetic field (in-plane magnetic field, arXiv.org)

  21. 2210.17023 Rotational symmetry breaking in superconducting nickelate Nd0.8Sr0.2NiO2 films (arXiv.org)

  22. 2210.17058 Antiferromagnetism and chiral-d wave superconductivity in a honeycomb lattice close to Mott state (arXiv.org)

  23. 2210.17503 Andreev Reflection and Klein Tunneling in High-Temperature Superconductor/Graphene Junctions (Lado, arXiv.org)

  24. PhysRevX.12.041011 Wigner Formulation of Thermal Transport in Solids (transport, PRX)

  25. PhysRevLett.129.191101 Black Hole Solutions as Topological Thermodynamic Defects (PRL)

  26. PhysRevB.106.134211 Anderson and many-body localization in the presence of spatially correlated classical noise (PRB)

  27. PhysRevB.106.134437 Expressive power of complex-valued restricted Boltzmann machines for solving nonstoquastic Hamiltonians (PRB)

    Boltzmann machines?, Restricted Boltzmann machines in quantum physics, Nature (2019)

    Bernevig, Restricted Boltzmann machines and matrix product states of one-dimensional translationally invariant stabilizer codes, PRB (2019)

  28. S0021364022601749 Critical Temperature of a Superconductor/Ferromagnet Nanostructure near a Magnetic Skyrmion (skyrmion SC, JETP Letters)

  29. PhysRevB.106.134438 Band-folding-driven high tunnel magnetoresistance ratios in (111)-oriented junctions with ${\mathrm{SrTiO}}_{3}$ barriers (PRB)

  30. PhysRevB.106.144313 Measurement-induced criticality as a data-structure transition (ML, PRB)

  31. PhysRevB.106.144438 Fermionic interpretation of the quantum phase transition in XXZ magnets (PRB)

  32. PhysRevB.106.144513 Superconductivity out of a non-Fermi liquid: Free energy analysis (PRB)

  33. PhysRevB.106.165131 Ab initio guided minimal model for the Kitaev material ${\mathrm{BaCo}}{2}$(${\mathrm{AsO}}{4}{)}_{2}$: Importance of direct hopping, third-neighbor exchange, and quantum fluctuations (PRB)

  34. PhysRevB.106.165133 Nontrivial quantum geometry of degenerate flat bands (BMera, PRB)

  35. PhysRevB.106.165134 Dual-gated hBN/bilayer-graphene superlattices and the transitions between the insulating phases at the charge neutrality point (PRB)

  36. PhysRevB.106.165428 Signatures of the long-range phase transition in topological Josephson junctions (PRB)

  37. PhysRevB.106.L140408 Enhanced magnon-magnon entanglement in the vicinity of an angular momentum compensation point of a ferrimagnet in a cavity (JCShim, PRB)

  38. PhysRevB.106.L161115 Breakdown of heavy quasiparticles in a honeycomb Kondo lattice: A quantum Monte Carlo study (Kondo, PRB)

  39. 2210.15693 Dynamical phases transitions in periodically driven Bardeen-Cooper-Schrieffer systems (arXiv)

  40. 2210.15864 Theoretical analysis of anisotropic upper critical field of superconductivity in nodal-line semimetals (arXiv)

  41. 2210.16235 Interplay of Hidden Orbital Order and Superconductivity in CeCoIn5 (CeCoIn5, arXiv)

  42. 2210.16293 Pair-Kondo effect: a mechanism for time-reversal broken superconductivity and finite-momentum pairing in UTe$_2$ (arXiv)

  43. 2210.15816 Hidden Topological Transitions in Emergent Magnetic Monopole Lattices (YMotome, arXiv)

  44. 2210.15867 Stripe order and spin dynamics in triangular-lattice antiferromagnet KErSe$_{2}$: A single-crystal study with a theoretical description (arXiv)

  45. 2210.15974 Systematic study for two-dimensional $Z_2$ topological phase transitions at high-symmetry points in all layer groups (SMurakami, arXiv)

  46. 2210.16108 Spin and charge modulations of a half-filled extended Hubbard model (Schowinger boson, arXiv)
